data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.5 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.3 PB 1
data.actual_result: You can't edit the owner's roles.
data.expected_result: You should be able to edit the owner's roles like it is possible with the Desktop Client
data.short_description: Owner's roles can't be edited via server settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on a server where you have admin or manage roles permission but you are not the owner - Go to server settings - Open members - Search for the owner - Observe how you can't change anything
